content: पूर् {vI.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (पूर्यते, पूर्ण) {@--1@} To fill, fill out (allied in this sense with <ab>pass.</ab> of पॄ <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--2@} To please, satisfy. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (पूरयति-ते, पूरित; strictly the {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} of पॄ <ab>q. v.</ab>) {@--1@} To fill; को न याति वशं लोके मुखे पिंडेन पूरिनः <ls>Bh. 2. 118</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 64</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">16. 34.</ls> {@--2@} To blow into or fill with wind, blow (as a conchshell). {@--3@} To cover, surround; <ls>Bk. 7. 30.</ls> {@--4@} To fulfil, satisfy; पूग्यतु कुतूहलं वत्सः <ls>U. 4</ls>; so आशां, मनोरथं &c. {@--5@} To intensify, strengthen (as sound). {@--6@} To make resonant. {@--7@} To load or enrich with (gifts &c.). {@--8@} To draw (as a bow). {@--9@} To spend (time).
